meanings.definition: A person who rides a bodyboard in the ocean.
meanings.sent1: The bodyboarder caught a big wave and rode it all the way to shore.
meanings.sent2: Every summer, the beach is filled with bodyboarders enjoying the waves.
meanings.sent3: The bodyboarder tried to do a trick but ended up splashing into the water comically.
meanings.sent4: Like a skilled dancer on the waves, the bodyboarder glided effortlessly along the ocean's surface.
meanings.sent5: The young bodyboarder's passion for the sport was evident in every graceful movement.

meanings.definition: One who engages in the sport of bodyboarding.
meanings.sent1: The bodyboarder was excited to participate in the upcoming competition.
meanings.sent2: As a bodyboarder, he always made time to practice his skills in the water.
meanings.sent3: The bodyboarder's dedication to the sport was unmatched, even practicing during rainy days.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of water sports, the bodyboarder was a true master of his craft.
meanings.sent5: The bodyboarder's determination to improve pushed him to new heights in the sport.
